code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     context.setSSLContextParameters(getClientSSLContextParameters()).     ((SSLContextParametersAware) context.getComponent("stomp")).setUseGlobalSslContextParameters(true).     return context. }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             fromF("stomp:test?brokerURL=ssl://localhost:%d", getPort()).transform(body().convertToString()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
